introduction: Some dishes have the taste of our childhood. Cooking is not only about nutrition, but also about cul

vocabulary.definition: a component part or element of something
vocabulary.example: The key ingredient in this recipe is fresh basil.

vocabulary.definition: shared by all members of a community; for common use
vocabulary.example: The village had a communal garden where everyone could plant vegetables.

vocabulary.definition: relating to or inherited from an ancestor or ancestors
vocabulary.example: She inherited her ancestral home from her grandparents.

vocabulary.definition: originating or occurring naturally in a particular place; native
vocabulary.example: The indigenous people of Australia have a rich cultural heritage.

vocabulary.definition: spoken rather than written; relating to the mouth
vocabulary.example: The oral tradition of storytelling has been passed down for generations.

vocabulary.definition: to add interest or excitement to something
vocabulary.example: She added some chili flakes to spice up the pasta sauce.
